mapper.select: SELECT t.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY T.Village) RowNumber FROM ( SELECT 村 AS Village, 种类 AS Breed, Convert(decimal(38,2),SUM(面积_亩)) AS Acreage FROM CROP WHERE Season = #{season,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY 村,种类 ) t

SELECT t.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY T.Household) RowNumber FROM ( SELECT 所属户 AS Household, 种类 AS Breed, Convert(decimal(38,2),SUM(面积_亩)) AS Acreage FROM CROP WHERE Season = #{season,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND 村 = #{village,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY 所属户,种类 ) t
SELECT DISTINCT 村 FROM CROP WHERE 村 is not null AND 村 != ''
SELECT DISTINCT 种类 FROM CROP WHERE 种类 is not null AND 种类 != ''
SELECT 村 as Village, 所属户 as Household, 种类 as Breed, Convert(decimal(38,2),面积_亩) as Acreage, Season, OBJECTID FROM CROP WHERE 所属户 like '%'+#{household,jdbcType=VARCHAR}+'%'
SELECT 种类 as Breed, Convert(decimal(38,2), sum(面积_亩)) AS Area FROM CROP WHERE Season=#{season,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY 种类
